itemTemplates.name: Traveler's Rations
itemTemplates.description: Hard bread, dried meat and cheese. Enough for a day's journey.

itemTemplates.name: Farmers Rations
itemTemplates.description: Hard bread, dried mystery meat. Enough for a small journey.

itemTemplates.name: Bobs Left Toe
itemTemplates.description: Preserved food for harsh conditions. Tastes like boot leather.

itemTemplates.name: Healing Salve
itemTemplates.description: Herbal paste that mends minor wounds.

itemTemplates.name: Holy Water Vial
itemTemplates.description: Blessed water from the nearest chantry.

itemTemplates.name: Dwarven Spear
itemTemplates.description: Perfectly balanced for combat, made by master smiths.

itemTemplates.name: Antivan Poison Vial
itemTemplates.description: A deadly concoction from the Crows of Antiva.

itemTemplates.name: Qunari War Paint
itemTemplates.description: Grants the ferocity of the Arishok himself.
stats: +1 AC while wearing - Until Long Rest

itemTemplates.name: Masterwork Longsword
itemTemplates.description: A blade of exceptional craftsmanship from Orlais.

itemTemplates.name: Fade-Touched Leather Armour
itemTemplates.description: Supple armor infused with the essence of the Fade itself.

itemTemplates.name: Chantry Blessed Amulet
itemTemplates.description: Protected by the Maker's light.

itemTemplates.name: Blade of the Warden
itemTemplates.description: A longsword forged in the fires of Orzammar, tempered with lyrium.
stats: 2d8 Slashing +1d8 Slashing against Darkspawn. One Handed

itemTemplates.name: Lyrium-Laced Ring
itemTemplates.description: A silver band pulsing with raw magical energy.

itemTemplates.name: Bundle of Wax Coated String
itemTemplates.description: A bundle of weaved string, seemingly coated in wax. 50ft.

itemTemplates.name: Childrens doll
itemTemplates.description: A simple home-made childrens doll. I daren't ask where it came from.

itemTemplates.name: Vial of the Artisans memory
itemTemplates.description: Legends say, if you listen close, you can hear the Artisans child laughing. Lasts 1 combat or 1 minute
stats: Roll advantage on first attack roll each turn. Roll advantage on lockpicking and dex checks

itemTemplates.name: Kogane's Arrow
itemTemplates.description: Wielded by the Legendary Kogane, jack of all trades but master of none.
stats: 50% Chance. Crtit Hit or Crit Miss. 1d10+2 per arrow

itemTemplates.name: Storm Ruler
itemTemplates.description: Once wielded by Fen'harel's right hand man. Now just a shadow of it's former glory. 2 handed Katana

itemTemplates.name: Longbow
itemTemplates.description: Discarded hunters longbow, definitely seen better days.

itemTemplates.name: Longsword
itemTemplates.description: Discarded Soldier's Blade, straight from Ostagar... with a crack down the middle -The Merchant

itemTemplates.name: Silverene Dagger
itemTemplates.description: Lose lose win lose win lose win win win...
stats: +5 Hit DC. 1d6+2. Chance to extend range by 5 feet

itemTemplates.name: Fishing Rod
itemTemplates.description: What happened to the fisherman who owned it? Noone knows...

itemTemplates.name: Grey Grimoire
itemTemplates.description: Legend has it, the garden witch who used this grimoire, sold it.
stats: +1 Hit DC to magic of your choosing

itemTemplates.name: Monacle of seeing
itemTemplates.description: She knows...
stats: Adv on Perception based rolls. True sight

itemTemplates.name: Powder of smallening
itemTemplates.description: Yum tum yummy tum tee
stats: 5 Uses. Allows you to go small, disengaging a fight with 10ft movement. No opportunity attack while small

itemTemplates.name: Unidentified Ore
itemTemplates.description: An ore of unknown origin. Has a strange glow to it

itemTemplates.name: Rose of true confession
itemTemplates.description: This rose has undocumented beauty

itemTemplates.name: Backpack of the visionary
itemTemplates.description: This backpack allows the user to reach to the gods, asking for any material item.

itemTemplates.name: Strange Glowing Orb
itemTemplates.description: This orb is stated to be linked to some of the most powerful demons in the fade. Maybe ready to make a contract with any such adventurer that dare?
stats: Make a contract with any type of demon. One time use

itemTemplates.name: Dalish Spirit Essence
itemTemplates.description: Distilled from ancient Dalish rituals. Exceedingly rare.
